mapper.select: select no, title, to_char(sdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') sdate, time, content, writer from schedule where no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into schedule(no, title, sdate, time, content, writer) values(schedule_seq.nextval,#{title},#{sdate},#{time},#{content},#{writer})
mapper.update: update schedule set title=#{title},sdate=#{sdate},time=#{time}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer} where no=#{no}
